title: Eat
subtitle: Exploring the Food Traditions of Communion and Agape Feast

unleavenedBread.name: Unleavened Bread
unleavenedBread.description: Traditional unleavened bread used for Passover and Communion, symbolizing purity and swift redemption.

communionGrapeJuice.name: Communion Grape Juice
communionGrapeJuice.description: Grape juice representing Christ's blood, used in Communion.

agapeFeast.name: Agape Feast Meal
agapeFeast.description: Traditional meal of the early church agape feast, emphasizing communion and sharing.
